import React,{useEffect} from 'react' import "./MainList.css" import useMainHook from "../../Hooks/Main/useMainHook" import { useRecoilState } from "recoil"; import {mainPageNumState, mainTotalPageNumState} from "../../stores/mainState" import TimeCounting from "time-counting"; import moment from "moment" import 'moment/locale/ko' const MainList = () => { const { getProject,project,setProject,deleteProject } = useMainHook(); const [pageNum,setPageNum] = useRecoilState(mainPageNumState); const [totalPage,setTotalPage] = useRecoilState(mainTotalPageNumState); useEffect( async ()=>{ getProject(pageNum).then((res)=>{ setProject(res.data.projectList) setTotalPage(res.data.totalPages) }) },[pageNum]) const deleteProjects = (id) =>{ deleteProject(id) } return(
{ project.map((project)=>( <> {console.log(project)} )) }
제목 작성자(리더) 내용 생성 날짜 좋아요 태그 삭제여부
{project.title} {project.users[0].name} {moment(project.createAt).format('YYYY MMMM Do')}
{moment(project.createAt).format('h:mm.ss a')} 		{project.likeNum} {project.tags[0]} {deleteProjects(id)}}>
삭제
) } export default MainList;
